page_content:
In 2021 we installed 589 solar panels in our 
Israel manufacturing facilities, to support our 
commitment to renewable energy and improve 
our consumption.  The panels are expected to 
become operational in 2022. We are currently examining the expansion of our use of solar panels to additional Stratasys facilities.
